newsitem.title: NIGERIA: 11 Nigerian women footballers die in road crash.
newsitem.headline: 11 Nigerian women footballers die in road crash.

text.p: Fourteen people, including 11 policewomen footballers, died when the bus they were in plunged into a river, a police statement said on Thursday.

It said the accident occured on Wednesday night along the Lagos-Benin expressway after a heavy downpour. Police said the members of the Police Machine Football Team had been returning from a match in eastern Nigeria.
"As a result of the accident, 11 women players, two coaches and the driver, were all confirmed dead," it said.
The Lagos-Benin expressway is the main gateway to eastern Nigeria and accidents are common along the pot-holed road, which is currently undergoing rehabilitation in several sections.
